text: The Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) movies are a series of American superhero movies produced by Marvel Studios based on Marvel Comics characters. It is the most successful movie franchise of all time, having made over $29.8 billion around the world. == List of movies == === The Infinity Saga === ==== Phase One ==== Movie U.S. release date Director Screenwriter(s) Producer(s) Iron Man Jon Favreau Mark Fergus & Hawk Ostby and Art Marcum & Matt Holloway Avi Arad and Kevin Feige The Incredible Hulk Louis Leterrier Zak Penn Avi Arad, Gale Anne Hurd, and Kevin Feige Iron Man 2 Jon Favreau Justin Theroux Kevin Feige Thor Kenneth Branagh Ashley Edward Miller & Zack Stentz and Don Payne Captain America: The First Avenger Joe Johnston Christopher Markus & Stephen McFeely.
